text: Nike Privacy and Cookie Policy
Update and effective date: July 2022
label: Policy Change

text: This privacy policy and cookie policy (referred to as "privacy policy") clearly clarify that you use Nike Commercial (China) Co., Ltd. (registered address: 99 Jiangwan City Road, Yangpu District, Shanghai) and its related company Nike Sports (China) Co., Ltd. (registered address: No. 88, Guangzhou West Road, Taicang Economic Development Zone, Jiangsu Province), (hereinafter collectively referred to as "Nike", "Our" or "We") operations and the Nike products/services provided by youCollecting and processing personal information.
label: Contact Information

text: This privacy policy also explains how to use, share or protect your personal information, what rights do you enjoy for your personal information, and how you exercise your rights.
You should choose whether to read the content of the privacy policy after careful reading and fully understanding the privacy policy and whether to agree with the use of Nike products/services.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: You should choose whether to read the content of the privacy policy after careful reading and fully understanding the privacy policy and whether to agree with the use of Nike products/services.

text: If you do not agree with the content of this privacy policy, it may cause us to be unable to provide you with the corresponding function normally, or to achieve the service effect we want to achieve, we recommend that you immediately stop visiting and using Nike products/services.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: If you do not agree with the content of this privacy policy, we recommend that you stop access and use Nike products/services immediately.

text: We recommend that you read this privacy policy in conjunction with other related agreements, texts (such as the Terms of Use "," Sales Terms ", etc.).
For key content, we use the "bold" writing method to remind, I hope you pay special attention to when reading.
In addition, before you provide us with any sensitive personal information, you have carefully considered and confirmed here that the provision is appropriate.

In addition, our websites, mobile Internet applications, etc., will use other third -party services, including but not limited to third -party websites, application links, API interfaces, etc., more conveniently provide you with services or reference.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
rewrite: Our websites, mobile Internet applications, etc. will use other third -party services, including but not limited to third -party websites, application links, API interfaces, etc.

text: For example, the third -party website and application of the link have their own privacy statements or policies, we strongly recommend that you view it.
We cannot be responsible for its content and any privacy practices in any link or application to our own content or control.
label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important
Risk
rewrite: We cannot be responsible for its content and any privacy practices in any link or application to our own content or control.

1. Keyword definition
In this privacy policy:
Personal information: Refers to various information related to recognized or recognized natural persons recorded in electronics or other ways, excluding information after anonymous processing.

Sensitive personal information: Refers to personal information that can easily cause the personality and dignity of natural persons to be infringed or harmed by personal and property security, including biometrics, religious beliefs, specific identity, medical health, financial accounts, trajectory trajectory and other information.And personal information under minor at the age of 14.

Nike Products/Service: Refers to Nike through its own website or mobile Internet application (including APP and applets), or related products and services provided by Nike's self -operated stores on a third -party platform, including:
(A) Nike's official website;
(B) Nike Nike APP;
(c)  Nike Adapt App;
(D) Nike WeChat public account;
(E) WeChat Mini Program, including Nike WeChat Mini Program, Nike Training Club ("NTC"), Swoosh Smart Retail Mini Program, Nike After -sales Worry -Free Application, etc.;

(F) Nike Tmall's self -operated store, including Tmall Nike official flagship store, Tmall Jordan official flagship store, Tmall Nike children's official flagship store, Tmall Nike official Outlets, etc.
2. How do we collect and use your personal information

When you buy or use Nike's products/services, you need or can choose to authorize us to collect and use personal information. Our functional scenarios will include basic functions (can be used in the visitor mode) and expansion functions (required to register/log in Nike Nike NikeMembers or separately authorized), of which:
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 1. In order to provide you with the basic functions of our product/service, you need to authorize us to collect and use necessary personal information. If you refuse to provide these necessary personal information, you will not be able to use our product/service normally;
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: You need to authorize us to collect and use necessary personal information. If you refuse to provide these necessary personal information, you will not be able to use our product/service normally.

text: 2. In order to provide you with the expansion function of our product/service, you can choose to authorize us to collect and use other personal information. If you refuse to provide these personal information, you will not be able to use this related additional features normally or cannot achieve what we intend to achieveFunctional effects, but it does not affect your basic functions that use our product/service normally.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: You can choose to authorize us to collect and use other personal information. If you refuse to provide it, you will not be able to use this related additional features normally or cannot achieve functional effects, but it will not affect your normal use of basic functions.

text: In some cases, we will collect and use your personal information from a third party (for example, our partners) within your consent range.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: In some cases, we will collect and use your personal information from a third party within your consent range.

text: We handle your personal information in accordance with the contract signed with the third party and the relevant laws and regulations. At the same time, please read the personal information protection policy and user agreement of the third party in detail.
label: Usage

text: If you refuse to collect and use your personal information when providing services, it may cause you to be unable to use some of our functions.

Important
First Party Collection Information

label: Usage

label: Important
Edit/Control
